CREATE SCHEMA cd;

SET client_encoding = 'UTF8';
SET standard_conforming_strings = on;
SET check_function_bodies = false;
SET client_min_messages = warning;

SET search_path = cd, pg_catalog;
SET default_tablespace = '';
SET default_with_oids = false;

CREATE TABLE inflation (
    infid integer NOT NULL,
    inflation numeric NOT NULL,
    infdata timestamp without time zone NOT NULL
);


CREATE TABLE profession (
    profid integer NOT NULL,
    profnameid integer NOT NULL,
    salary numeric NOT NULL,
	salarydata timestamp without time zone NOT NULL
);


CREATE TABLE nameprof (
    nameid integer NOT NULL,
    nameprof character varying(100) NOT NULL
);


INSERT INTO inflation (infid, inflation, starttime) VALUES
